timeline.message: Tie the AsyncInvocationInterceptor to each invocation

timeline.bodyText: This is just for convenience here and in ClientInvocationBuilder, isn't it?
timeline.author: asoldano

replies.bodyText: Well it's used, and this was the previous default. I assume this will be used by the non-MP resteasy client.
replies.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: So this is customised by the MP client.
replies.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: Thanks, just noticed (that's what happens when reviewing from github UI only and not checking out the code...)
replies.author: asoldano
